comments_since_last_sample.body: Just call him jeyyyykeyyyy....of coz jk is bts main vocalist
And now we how deeply Jungkook means when he says that he will either live with passion or he won't live !
Yaa, and i try sing the song. When the lyrics part of triple FALLING, my voice auto crack hehehehhe

Best Song of the year! Best Cover of the year! I have listened to this song through many reactors. Everyone's response.... "WOW". The phrase with the high note "Blew me away!" JK's lower register is stunningly equisite!! His English pronunciation is stellar.   I want more! I need more! Trivia...Big Hit sent young JK to train in hip-hop dancing in L.A. He came back so enthusiastic that he told Jimin he wanted to quit BTS and become a  full time dancer. Luckily, Jimin talked him out of it! JK said in an interview he had NO idea that he would become the main lead vocalist. He had no confidence in his voice. And now....we are here! JK the best male soloist in the world!
Performance of "Falling" This is a sensation in the music world! Bravo JK! Singer from God! 🎶😭🤧🙉😘 Thank you to the author for your appreciation of Jungkook's work! 👍😘
